body:
Can we do matrix transpose (rows become columns and columns become rows) in standard SQL2005/2008? 
1 2 3 4 5
4 5 6 6 7
7 8 9 8 9
1 3 4 5 6
2 4 5 6 7
changes to 
1 4 7 1 2
2 5 8 3 4 
3 6 9 5 6
4 6 8 5 6
5 7 9 6 7
how about no of rows <> no of column ? let's consider the no of rows it's fixed.
title: Matrix Transpose TSQL
